txt.en: You have returned to the high cliffs above Helegrod to face Storvâgûn.
You have triumphed over Storvâgûn at Helegrod.

High in the cliffs above Helegrod, the traitorous Storvâgûn has pledged the giants of the Misty Mountains to the service of Angmar in exchange for vast riches.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when you leave the instance.</rgb>
Collect Storvâgûn's tarnished emblem of loyalty

At the behest of Arifael, brave adventurers once faced Storvâgûn, a giant of the Misty Mountains who pledged his people to the service of Angmar in exchange for vast riches. He must be defeated once more, and the emblem of loyalty he bears must be taken from him!
The emblem of loyalty crumbles in your hands...
You have emerged victorious from Helegrod, and freed the giants of the Misty Mountains from the traitorous Storvâgûn!
